name: Khalil Habibi
story: Abdul-Wahhab Yousuf was born and raised in a small village in Iran. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his dedication and expertise in missile technology. He is known for his calm demeanor under pressure and his focused approach to any task at hand. He is married with two children and is determined to provide a better life for his family through his service in the military.
